modName: Vanilla Armors Replacer UUNP-CBBE UNP UNPB 7Base MCBM HDT
summary: make [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1575830][color=#ffa07a]nisetanaka[/color][/url]'s "Bikini Armors" & Halofarm's "Nordic Carved Bikini" as a Replacers for the Vanilla Armors
descriptionHtml:
What's up Folks , you ask for it here it is 
All [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1575830]Nisetanaka[/url]'s "Bikini Armors" & [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/nordic-carved-bikini-for-7bo/]Halofarm[/url]'s "Nordic Carved Bikini" as a Replacers for the Vanilla Armors , so let's see what we Have Here ! :

[color=#1e84cc][size=5]Requirement :
[/size][/color]
"Bodyslide Outfit" Go Install v3.6 or Newer (Bodyslide Users)

"HDT breast and butt physics" Go Take the Last version

"HDT Physics extensions" Go Grab the Last version

"XPMS maximum skeleton extended" Go slap the Last version

+ the Originals Mods for some minor Textures ! & to avoid weird Stuffs


[size=4]Credits:[/size]
[size=2][url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/nordic-carved-bikini-for-7bo/][color=#1e84cc]Halofarm[/color][/url][color=#ff0000] [/color]for the Magic Nordic Armor
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1575830][color=#1e84cc]Nisetanaka[/color][/url] for All this Magic Armors
